tess.jobs.thermostats.runtime_job module¶

class tess.jobs.thermostats.runtime_job.RuntimeJob(automation)[source]¶

Bases: tess.jobs.thermostats.ThermostatBaseJob

This class is for running fan on for a certain time period every hour regardless of air quality sensor data. Blind random test to see if we can compare Fan runtime to Fan rule.
